title: The Hidden Sun
description: A faraway kingdom. A beautiful princess. A courageous hero.A ruthless villain.An impossible choice.Eliana and Rinan are in love. However, she is destined to become queen of Bariwon, obligated to marry the victor of a competition called the Shoginoc, while Rinan, her royal guardian, is forbidden to marry. Normally they could renounce their titles to be together, but these are not normal times. Abrecan, the malevolent governor of Erd, is determined to win the Shoginoc, thereby placing his easily manipulated son Daimh on Bariwonâ€™s throne. Can Eliana and Rinan find a way to be together without jeopardizing the peace they are so desperately trying to protect?
author: J. Lloyd Morgan
